entry.title: Coinbase Finally Launches Subscription Service Overseas, Focuses on Staking
entry.summary: The exchange has launched Coinbase One—and is accelerating its push overseas.

entry.title: MicroStrategy Looking at Bitcoin Ordinals for App Development, Says Michael Saylor
entry.summary: “Right now, enterprises have weak security compared to Bitcoin,” Saylor told Decrypt.

entry.title: Beeple, Bitboy, and a 'Dumping' Bored Ape: How It All Hit the Fan
entry.summary: Famed digital artist Beeple waded into a Crypto Twitter mess centered on influencer Bitboy’s relationship to a controversial meme token.

entry.title: Jack Dorsey Leads $6 Million Raise for Bitcoin Payments Company Azteco
entry.summary: Block CEO and former Twitter CEO Jack Dorsey, a noted Bitcoin aficionado, led the round for a startup focused on redeemable Bitcoin vouchers.

entry.title: Bitcoin Companies Must Provide 'Proof of Reserves' in Texas
entry.summary: Crypto exchanges with Texas customers have to provide "proof of reserves" and make sure customers funds can always be "fully withdrawn."

entry.title: Bitcoin 2023 Attendees in Miami Blame Bear Market Vibes for Lower Attendance
entry.summary: Day one attendees said they expect crowds to look less sparse tomorrow, when general admission pass holders show up.

entry.title: Litecoin Activity Hits All-Time High Thanks to Ordinals Mania
entry.summary: The blockchain is being used to mint Ordinals following Bitcoin congestion.

entry.title: OpenAI Debuts ChatGPT App for Apple iPhone, Says Android Coming Soon
entry.summary: OpenAI launches free iOS ChatGPT app, enabling history sync and GPT-4 access for Plus subscribers.

entry.title: Bitcoin Custody Services Are Coming to Custodia Bank, Says CEO Caitlin Long
entry.summary: The Custodia Bank CEO said she, a hardcore Bitcoiner, started a bank because the world isn't ready for "hyperbitcoinization” yet.

entry.title: Why Azra Games CEO Mark Otero is Not a Fan of "Play-to-Earn" Games
entry.summary: "Each game is a miracle," says Azra Games CEO Mark Otero. In this clip, he shares his thoughts on "play-to-earn" games and gamer motivation with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: NFT Lending Platform Blend Surges Past 100,000 Ethereum in Total Volume
entry.summary: After adding two blue-chip NFT collections, Blend strengthened its market-leading position, just weeks after its launch.

entry.title: Europe a 'Significant Beneficiary' of US Crypto Regulatory Confusion: Ripple CEO
entry.summary: With regulators stateside still scrambling to rein in the industry, rule makers in Europe, notably in France, are extending invitations.

entry.title: NFT Artist and Collector OSF: 'NFTs Are Just a Medium'
entry.summary: The House of Fine Art gallery is playing host to an exhibition of pioneering NFT artists—but the word “NFT” is nowhere to be seen.

entry.title: Ripple Rolls Out CBDC Platform for Governments, Financial Institutions
entry.summary: Crypto firm Ripple is pushing further into the CBDC game, unveiling a new platform for creating blockchain-based digital currencies

entry.title: Binance Australia Loses Crypto Ramp PayID ‘With Immediate Effect’
entry.summary: Binance Australia has had to suspend PayID AUD deposits due to a decision by a third-party service provider.

entry.title: DeFi Token Synthetix Soars 10% as Community Mulls PEPE Market Launch
entry.summary: SNX surged overnight as the Synthetix community weighs integrating the popular meme cryptocurrency PEPE into its DeFi offering.

entry.title: Bankrupt Crypto Broker Voyager Cleared to Repay $1.3B to Creditors
entry.summary: Voyager said the initial payments will be made either in crypto through the Voyager app or in cash after a waiting period of 30 days.

entry.title: Gala Games Burns Over $600 Million Worth of GALA Tokens
entry.summary: Web3 startup Gala Games said that it has virtually depleted its own treasury to alleviate concerns of a future token selloff.

entry.title: Adidas Web3 Lead Thought She ‘Could Get Fired’ for Signing Bored Ape Deal
entry.summary: Erika Wykes-Sneyd joins Decrypt’s gm podcast to discuss how apparel giant Adidas approaches NFTs and emerging culture alike.

entry.title: Seizing Upon Ledger Stumble, Hardware Wallet Competitors Offer Discounts
entry.summary: BitBox, Cold Card, Trezor and Blockstream all announced sale prices on their cold storage devices.

entry.title: Most Americans Consider AI a Threat to Humanity, New Poll Finds
entry.summary: A Reuters/Ipsos poll shows that 61% of Americans believe AI to be a threat to humanity.

entry.title: SEC Believes Filecoin Is a Security, Grayscale Warns Investors
entry.summary: The SEC said Grayscale has to withdraw its Filecoin Trust application because FIL is an unregistered security.

entry.title: Ron DeSantis Banned CBDCs in Florida—These States Could Be Next
entry.summary: The Sunshine State isn’t the only one speaking out against a potential digital dollar.

entry.title: Enter the 'Unioverse': The Cinematic Sci-Fi Game Takes Shape on Polygon
entry.summary: PREVIEW: We go hands-on with the Unioverse Proving Grounds, a flashy playtest from former Grand Theft Auto and Call of Duty developers.

entry.title: Meet Kim Asendorf: The Metallica Video Director Who Makes NFT Art Designed to Hypnotize
entry.summary: "Colors of Noise" is a series of 50 Ethereum NFT art pieces, and the pixelated waveforms could "disturb" viewers, Kim Asendorf tells Decrypt.

entry.title: Dogecoin Activity Surges With Ordinals—But a Core DOGE Dev Is Skeptical
entry.summary: One of DOGE's core developers said "sustained and growing pressure on Dogecoin will cause this to die off quickly."

entry.title: How Many Games Are Building On Solana? The Answer Might Surprise You
entry.summary: Solana Games General Manager Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the current state of Solana's Web3 gaming ecosystem.

entry.title: Tether Pledges to Plow 15% of Profits into Bitcoin
entry.summary: Bitcoin has ‘continually proven its resilience’ said Tether's CTO, as the stablecoin issuer adds to its $1.5 billion reserves of the cryptocurrency.

entry.title: Ledger Expands Cosmos Integration, Aims at Adding 20 New Projects
entry.summary: The hardware wallet provider claims that it’s “one of the first wallets” to offer support for Cosmos and the network's supported projects.

entry.title: Judge Denies Motion to Seal Hinman Documents in Ripple SEC Case
entry.summary: A judge denied the SEC’s motion to seal documents linked to a speech that explained why Bitcoin shouldn't be considered a security.

entry.title: DeFi Exchange Uniswap to Launch on Polkadot via Moonbeam Parachain
entry.summary: Uniswap V3 is coming to Polkadot on the Moonbeam parachain after a near-unanimous governance vote conducted by Blockchain at Michigan.

entry.title: Axie Infinity Rolls Out ‘Lite' Version of Crypto Game on Apple App Store
entry.summary: Starter characters on the app won't be NFTs, but the Axie Infinity COO says that users can transfer NFTs into the app.

entry.title: Ripple Acquires Crypto Custody Firm Metaco for $250M in Tokenization Push
entry.summary: Ripple expands into the institutional crypto custody market, predicting the niche will hit $10 trillion by the end of the decade.

entry.title: DeFi Project Bancor Hit With Lawsuit Over Impermanent Loss Protection Promises
entry.summary: Investors claim promises fell short, adding that Bancor’s DAO was centralized and its liquidity pools operated as unregistered securities.

entry.title: UK Treasury Committee Urges Government to Regulate Crypto as Gambling
entry.summary: The UK Treasury Committee proposed handing oversight to the Gambling Commission, with possible taxes to support addiction and debt advice.

entry.title: Crypto Lender Compound Deploys on Ethereum Layer-2 Arbitrum
entry.summary: DeFi powerhouse Compound Finance is rolling out its services on various speedy scaling solutions, tapping Arbitrum in the latest deployment.

entry.title: Celeb-backed Token Offerings More Likely to Be a Scam, Research Reports
entry.summary: Is your favorite celebrity backing a new cryptocurrency? That’s probably a “red flag for investors," say researchers.

entry.title: Elon Musk Takes Credit for OpenAI: 'It Wouldn't Exist Without Me'
entry.summary: Musk expressed concerns about OpenAI's shift towards a closed-source, for-profit model and Microsoft's influence.

entry.title: OpenAI CEO Calls for New Regulatory Agency for AI
entry.summary: Meanwhile, IBM and NYU experts suggest focusing on the safety, transparency, and risks of artificial intelligence.

entry.title: Problems With Being an 'On-Chain Purist' in Gaming
entry.summary: InfiniGods Cofounders Owen O'Donoghue and Damon Gura keep it real with Decrypt's Kate Irwin, sharing thoughts on game balancing and what to do when in-game assets become NFTs.

entry.title: Why Solana Won't Become A Web3 Game Publisher
entry.summary: Solana Foundation's Games General Manager Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Solana's "build together" approach as well as his thoughts on crypto firms becoming game publishers.

entry.title: The State Of Web3 Gaming On Hedera
entry.summary: Hedera VP Alex Russman tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Hedera's Web3 gaming ecosystem and shares a game he's particularly excited about.

entry.title: How Mirandus is Innovating Video Game Audio
entry.summary: Mirandus' Lead Developer and Gala Games Cofounder Michael McCarthy tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the game's thoughtful approach to audio design and the technologies being built to support the MMORPG's immersive world.

entry.title: Do Gamers Hate NFTs?
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin asks the InfiniGods developers Damon Gura and Owen O’Donoghue about gamers and NFTs.

entry.title: gm: Avenged Sevenfold's M. Shadows on Deathbats, Fandom, and AI
entry.summary: Avenged Sevenfold lead singer Matt Sanders, aka M. Shadows, is rehearsing for the band's upcoming tour. He's also figuring out how to upend what it means to be a music fan. The band launched a Deathbats Club NFT collection in 2021. That is to say: They were early. The lead singer said it was timed to give fans a chance to get comfortable with Web3 technology ahead of the group's 2023 tour, when the NFT holders can use their Deathbats for early access to tickets. M. Shadows also talked to hosts Andrew Hayward and Stephen Graves about AI and bringing Web3 into gaming.

entry.title: Inside Mojo Melee's Lore with Creator Mike Levine and Art Director Eric Campanella
entry.summary: At the Game Developers' Conference, Mojo Melee Creator Mike Levine and Art Director Eric Campanella tell Decrypt's Kate Irwin about their autobattler game and its unique characters, which are also NFTs on Polygon.

entry.title: Why 'Blair Witch' Exec Producer Kevin Foxe Is '1,000% In' on Gaming
entry.summary: "The Blair Witch Project" Executive Producer Kevin Foxe wants to avoid corporate overlords and enlighten fans of the dark "Mandala" graphic novel with a video game adaptation and NFTs across multiple blockchains.

entry.title: Gala Games Co-Founder on the Aesthetic of Mirandus
entry.summary: "When assets are overdone, they just feel a little dirty. It's not pretty to look at," shared Mirandus' Lead Developer and Gala Games co-founder Michael McCarthy in an interview with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: Solana Games GM: Play-to-Earn Games Are DeFi Products, Not Games
entry.summary: Solana Games' General Manager Johnny Lee offers a hot take on the first generation of Web3 gaming with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: Brycent's Advice For Gaming Content Creators
entry.summary: XSET's Brycent shares his advice for Web3 content creators with Decrypt's Kate Irwin, including which social media platform is best for posting content.

entry.title: Behind the Scenes of Jeremy Cowart's 'Auras' NFT Event
entry.summary: A look at the preparation behind "Auras," an event in which photographer Jeremy Cowart produced and starred in 10,000 photo-based NFTs, captured in less than 30 minutes before a live audience. Credit: Brett Carlsen for Decrypt

entry.title: Jeremy Cowart Discusses 'Auras' Event, Live-Shooting 10,000 Photo NFTs
entry.summary: Jeremy Cowart speaks with Decrypt's Sander Lutz in Nashville ahead of the "Auras" event, in which the noted photographer live-shot 10,000 unique photo-based NFTs in less than 30 minutes. The NFTs will be released through OpenSea on May 9. Video credit: Brett Carlsen for Decrypt

entry.title: Azra Games CEO on Putting Fun Before Web3
entry.summary: "The Web3 interfaces cannot be on the foreground of the player's initial experience," says Azra Games CEO Mark Otero.

entry.title: gm: Meet Immunefi's White Hat Whisperer
entry.summary: When Web3 bug bounty platform Immunefi launched two years ago, CEO and founder Mitchell Amador says the bug bounties weren't great and adoption was slow. But the tides started to turn because even if exploiting a smart contract nets a bigger payday than a bounty, it comes with a huge drawback. "There's a ton of risk when you engage in this, you know, wantonly criminal behavior and steal $200 million from someone else," he said. "There's no way someone's not going to come looking."

entry.title: Gala Games Co-Founder on Why Mirandus Will Not Have NPCs
entry.summary: Lead Mirandus Developer and Gala Games Cofounder Michael McCarthy tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the Web3 MMORPG Mirandus and what its world will be like.

entry.title: NFC Lisbon Founder John Karp Heralds 'Level 2' Content for 2023 Event
entry.summary: No panels, no problem. This year's NFC Lisbon from June 7 to June 9 boasts a variety of alternative formats, catering to a decentralized (and sometimes pseudonymous) NFT community. The event also plans to take a closer look into one of the faster-growing niches in NFTs: Photography and what founder John Karp calls "level 2" content. Not to be missed, as NFC Lisbon's media partner, Decrypt will be on-site for all three days. Come say hi!

entry.title: How Does Magic Eden Vet Web3 Games?
entry.summary: Magic Eden Chief Gaming Officer Chris Akhavan tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the NFT marketplace vets potential Web3 games for its platform.
